Post.title: Vue2+Echarts
Post._content:
> > # - vue2.x - vuex __ - vue-router __ - element-ui _vue2datePicker_ - echarts __ - webpackES6BabelStylus... GitHubstar^_^[https://github.com/SimonZhangITer/DataVisualization](https://github.com/SimonZhangITer/DataVisualization) #
PC
#
# ## vue-router checkbox~ ## ```html ``` HTML ### v-header - name __ - legendArr __ - myChart __ ### v-filter - myChart __ v-if="myChart._dom"domfilter ### main __ mainechartsdom ### vuemounted() ```javascript mounted() { // domecharts this.myChart = echarts.init(document.querySelector('.multipleColumn .main')) this.myChart.setOption(this.options) //this.optionsechartsgitHub } ``` created() ```javascript this.$nextTick(() => { this._init() }) ``` ## DashBoard dashboard ### html ```html ``` WrapperWrapperstyle - - - transform ### demotransformscalelefttop CSSlefttoptransform transform translate ```css transform: translate(-22.4%,0) scale(0.33) ``` # vue [https://github.com/SimonZhangITer/DataVisualization](https://github.com/SimonZhangITer/DataVisualization)

Post.title: vue2
Post._content:
> vuevue2.0vue # > vue2.0vuexvue-routeraxioswebpackeslintbetter-scroll ## chrome ### ## - - - star - - - - - - - - - - ## vuevue-cli,webpack - - PostCsschromecsscss - Eslint-.- - bableES2015ES6.bableES6ES5 - StylusSASS/SCSS{} - ... vue-clinode ## vuereactangular vueHTMLCSSJS ### Axios vue1.xvueHTTPvue-resourcevue2.0axios resaxiosjsonres.data ```javascript axios.get(url).then((res)=>{ this.data = res.data }) ``` ### Vuex vuevuexangularfactoryservice ```javascript const store = new Vuex.Store({ state: { count: 0 }, mutations: { increment(state) { state.count++ } } }) ``` ### Vue-Router vue-routervuerouterappview ```javascript router.push('test') ``` ### vue2.0v-elrefref ```html
test
...js code this.$ref.testHook ``` ### ref ```html ...js code this.$ref.testHook.add() //testadd ``` emit vue2 test: ```javascript export default { method:{ click(){ Vue.$emit('add',{}) // } } } ``` testcreated ```javascript export default { created(){ Vue.$on('add',this.add) }, method:{ add(){ this.count++ } } } ``` vueGitHubstar Hah ## ``` bash # install dependencies npm install # serve with hot reload at localhost:8080 npm run dev # build for production with minification npm run build ``` ##      ## - QQ745913574 - QQ149683643
Post.raw:
--- title: vue2 tags: [vue,vue-router,vuex,axios,webpack,ES6] categories: [vue] cover: http://bpic.588ku.com/back_pic/03/70/33/0457b65f789abb3.jpg --- > vuevue2.0vue # > vue2.0vuexvue-routeraxioswebpackeslintbetter-scroll ## chrome ### ## - - - star - - - - - - - - - - ## vuevue-cli,webpack - - PostCsschromecsscss - Eslint-.- - bableES2015ES6.bableES6ES5 - StylusSASS/SCSS{} - ... vue-clinode ## vuereactangular vueHTMLCSSJS ### Axios vue1.xvueHTTPvue-resourcevue2.0axios resaxiosjsonres.data ```javascript axios.get(url).then((res)=>{ this.data = res.data }) ``` ### Vuex vuevuexangularfactoryservice ```javascript const store = new Vuex.Store({ state: { count: 0 }, mutations: { increment(state) { state.count++ } } }) ``` ### Vue-Router vue-routervuerouterappview ```javascript router.push('test') ``` ### vue2.0v-elrefref ```html
test
...js code this.$ref.testHook ``` ### ref ```html ...js code this.$ref.testHook.add() //testadd ``` emit vue2 test: ```javascript export default { method:{ click(){ Vue.$emit('add',{}) // } } } ``` testcreated ```javascript export default { created(){ Vue.$on('add',this.add) }, method:{ add(){ this.count++ } } } ``` vueGitHubstar Hah ## ``` bash # install dependencies npm install # serve with hot reload at localhost:8080 npm run dev # build for production with minification npm run build ``` ##      ## - QQ745913574 - QQ149683643
